verbs.description: South Carolina Rep. Mark Sanford [V: has] lost the Republican nomination for his congressional seat to an opponent who attacked his criticism of President Donald Trump .
[ARG0: South Carolina Rep. Mark Sanford] has [V: lost] [ARG1: the Republican nomination for his congressional seat] [ARG2: to an opponent who attacked his criticism of President Donald Trump] .
South Carolina Rep. Mark Sanford has lost the Republican nomination for his congressional seat to [ARG0: an opponent] [R-ARG0: who] [V: attacked] [ARG1: his criticism of President Donald Trump] .
